attributes.action: Force the app 'Snapchat' to bring back the visible best friends feature
attributes.additional_details:
A three year engagement was broken up due to the fact an affair was hidden by the lack of knowledge this new feature brought to the app. The affair lead to the total mental breakdown and long winded depression to one of the people in the relationship.

Jealous spouses/partners cannot see what their counterpart is doing via the app which has in many cases lead to physical and mental abuse. This has got to stop.
attributes.background: 'Snapchat' was established in 2011 and allowed all of your contacts to view 'best friends' - the people you talk to most. However in recent updates they have taken away this feature. Users feel this is a violation of their human and social rights as many infidelities are covered because of it.
